resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec non tellus malesuada diam semper pulvinar. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique
Sometimes you need some simple background placeholders to give you an idea about how things will look
Sometimes you need to lay out some views and get an aproximate feel for how big they are
Sometimes you need some placeholder icons until your graphics designer gets you the assets you need
Sometimes you want to layout a textbox without the distraction of a lorem ipsum text
Sometimes you need something prettier than a grid or cross and then you go looking among the placeholder drawables prefixed ph_photo_*
